class.name: TwoBoneIK3D
class.brief_description: Rotation based intersection of two circles inverse kinematics solver.
class.description: This [IKModifier3D] requires a pole target. It provides deterministic results by constructing a plane from each joint and pole target and finding the intersection of two circles (disks in 3D). This IK can handle twist by setting the pole direction. If there are more than one bone between each set bone, their rotations are ignored, and the straight line connecting the root-middle and middle-end joints are treated as virtual bones.

method.name: get_end_bone
method.description: Returns the end bone index.

method.name: get_end_bone_direction
method.description: Returns the end bone's tail direction when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_end_bone_length
method.description: Returns the end bone tail length of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_end_bone_name
method.description: Returns the end bone name.

method.name: get_middle_bone
method.description: Returns the middle bone index.

method.name: get_middle_bone_name
method.description: Returns the middle bone name.

method.name: get_pole_direction
method.description: Returns the pole direction.

method.name: get_pole_direction_vector
method.description: Returns the pole direction vector. If [method get_pole_direction] is [constant SkeletonModifier3D.SECONDARY_DIRECTION_NONE], this method returns [code]Vector3(0, 0, 0)[/code].

method.name: get_pole_node
method.description: Returns the pole target node that constructs a plane which the joints are all on and the pole is trying to direct.

method.name: get_root_bone
method.description: Returns the root bone index.

method.name: get_root_bone_name
method.description: Returns the root bone name.

method.name: get_target_node
method.description: Returns the target node that the end bone is trying to reach.

method.name: is_end_bone_extended
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the end bone is extended to have a tail.

method.name: is_using_virtual_end
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the end bone is extended from the middle bone as a virtual bone.

method.name: set_end_bone
method.description: Sets the end bone index.

method.name: set_end_bone_direction
method.description: Sets the end bone tail direction when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_end_bone_length
method.description: Sets the end bone tail length when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_end_bone_name
method.description: Sets the end bone name. [b]Note:[/b] The end bone must be a child of the middle bone.

method.name: set_extend_end_bone
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the end bone is extended to have a tail.

method.name: set_middle_bone
method.description: Sets the middle bone index.

method.name: set_middle_bone_name
method.description: Sets the middle bone name. [b]Note:[/b] The middle bone must be a child of the root bone.

method.name: set_pole_direction
method.description: Sets the pole direction. The pole is on the middle bone and will direct to the pole target. The rotation axis is a vector that is orthogonal to this and the forward vector. [b]Note:[/b] The pole direction and the forward vector shouldn't be colinear to avoid unintended rotation.

method.name: set_pole_direction_vector
method.description: Sets the pole direction vector. This vector is normalized by an internal process. If the vector length is [code]0[/code], it is considered synonymous with [constant SkeletonModifier3D.SECONDARY_DIRECTION_NONE].

method.name: set_pole_node
method.description: Sets the pole target node that constructs a plane which the joints are all on and the pole is trying to direct.

method.name: set_root_bone
method.description: Sets the root bone index.

method.name: set_root_bone_name
method.description: Sets the root bone name.

method.name: set_target_node
method.description: Sets the target node that the end bone is trying to reach.

method.name: set_use_virtual_end
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the end bone is extended from the middle bone as a virtual bone.
